title: Can i use the Alpha Client Replay System with the SkinSpotlights: Creator Suite?
body:
I'm just about to start making a montage for League of Legends and I'm just wondering, does the League Alpha Client Replay System work with the 
SkinSpotlights: Creator Suite Tool, http://www.skinspotlights.com/p/creator-suite.html , 
or do I have to use the SkinSpotlights: Replay System? 
http://www.skinspotlights.com/p/skinspotlights-replays.html

replies.body: We don't support any third party programs or modifications, so I wouldn't expect it to work with the updated client.  I advise you to be extra way about using these programs, as one may not know any malicious content hidden within or issues it could cause with your game.  Making a montage sounds really awesome, but I can't recommend going outside of official resources to make it happen.  Good luck!
